Meanwhile back in the cold climate of future Norway

Lunarpine didn't like the smell of his situation. Veratis was a week 
old bot who didn't seem to pose much of a threat but that's when 
things have been hitting him lately. 

Both bots remained silent for a long time before the silence was 
finally broken by Veratis. "You seem tired my friend, how long has it 
been since you recharged?" The scientist seemed naturally worried 
about his guest but he had other things on his mind as well.

Lunarpine couldn't understand Veratis's hospitality but his host had 
yet to give him any reason to deny his problems. "It's been a while, 
I think that It's been a day or so. I could be wrong."

"Then you must rest my new friend." Veratis' grin showed no more than 
a lonely bot looking for company. "Sit right here and I'll be right 
back." The host left the room with a seemingly anxious manner.

Lunarpine knew that all this hospitality wasn't because of his hosts  
need for company. His wolf senses told him there were two others 
accompanying Veratis, thier scents were week so it'd been some time 
since thier departure. Still he didn't want to seem an ungrateful 
guest so he decided to play along for now.

Veratis returned carrying a tray with old style energeon cubes, He 
placed the tray between them and picked up two. He handed one to 
Lunarpine and held one up to himself. "You still don't trust me? well 
then a toast, To the earning of trust." he then raised the cube to 
his mettalic lips and drained it dry.

The cube handed to Lunarpine didn't smell right, it had a distinct 
scent added to it. He set it back on the tray and picked up another 
one. this one smelled different, it was pure energeon, at least it 
smelled pure. The wolf tipped his head back, looking at Veratis the 
whole way. "Ya to earning trust." He too sucked the energeon dry. It 
fealt reinviggorating to recharge. He tried to stand, to feal the 
energy returning to his body. That was his second mistake. The 
wolfbot collapsed to the floor, going into stasis lock.
